website_summaries.verdict: Adequate and low-priced, this fishing float tube performs well on the lake.
pros: Goes in and out of the water easily
cons: This model sits a bit lower in the water and lacks a support for your fishing pole

customer_reviews.title: Nice First Float Tube
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy fishing and this is my first float tube. It worked very well and was sturdy for a recent lake fishing event. It lacks a few bells and whistles but is entirely adequate. I enjoyed the multiple pockets and it was comfortable and light weight enough to carry from my truck to the shoreline. It has a flag holding pocket which was required where I was fishing. I was with my friend who has a more expensive model with backpack straps on his and sits a little higher out of the water, but we both caught the same number of fish. The D rings are great where I attached a retractable net and a stringer. Overall great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: WebER

customer_reviews.title: Not for river floating
customer_reviews.text: The fish ruler/bar at the front of the tube is not durable, it came apart and I lost it in the river only after about 20 minutes, leaving me on a 6 hour float with no support in the front. It may work for still, deep water floating or fishing, but not for rivers with varying levels of water (only place to put your feet in shallow water is on the front bar - which is not meant for support). In rivers with debris, it is not safe to have your feet dangling below. I was excited for this to arrive and to use, and very disappointed in the results.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy mallow

customer_reviews.title: people look at me like im crazy out here
customer_reviews.text: im loving getting out in the water with this float tube, people look at me like im crazy out here. but im catching fish so yep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Really happy with this purchase. Really competitive price and a decent float tube. It is my first one but I have no complaints. Lots of storage, lightweight, easy to inflate. It's pretty cool!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not buy
customer_reviews.text: thid thing almost made me drown do not buy it doesnt hold air for very long and the bar will fall of and you will fall out if your using fins to manuver around
customer_reviews.author: amy blankenship

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so very fun!! We bought two of these, one for my hubby and one for myself - our first float tubes. Paired with flippers, these babies move around. Lots of storage and so very comfortable. Instructions on the inflating were a bit vague, but we figured it out. I'm not sure what the expensive float tubes have that this model doesn't have, but this was a great price point for us.
customer_reviews.author: screwie

customer_reviews.title: love this thing
customer_reviews.text: every where i go people ask me about it where i got it how easy is it to pack around. I actually have a backpack just for it when i go fishing i throw it on and go
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great value for $ not over priced.
customer_reviews.text: For fishing it’s great.I added a three pole holder on the side using rubber mesh & bungee cords to hold in place.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Nolen

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and perfectly suitable to the task
customer_reviews.text: This is a fun way to fish from the water instead of the bank. Inflation and deflation are easy, and the recommended flippers (not included) would be good enough for the Creature from the Black Lagoon. Great fun, no need for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Steven E. Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Lake/Bay Fishing Float Only
customer_reviews.text: Works well in areas with no current. Float tends to tilt forward if current is from behind, especially in a river. The bottom end where you sit is kinda low in the water for my comfort, the pvc pipe in front to keeps sides apart will continuesly pop out unless you glue pieces in middle (then it becomes a pain to take them out).
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Missing Armrest Bladders
customer_reviews.text: Mine was delivered and was missing the bladders for the armrests. Otherwise I’d have given it five stars. I stuffed the armrests with foam rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie's Choice

customer_reviews.title: Comfort at its best!
customer_reviews.text: We tried these inflatable tubes for the first time on the beach inside a bay area. The back support was very helpful and provided great back support. The product is meant to be used for fishing but we used for relaxation instead. Very durable material with lots of pockets for drinks. Does not have a place to keep your phone from getting wet so put the phone in a baggie and then in a zipper pouch on the float.
customer_reviews.author: Lupita

customer_reviews.title: Tiny seat.... needs another 12" of seating.
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this float is great except the tiny seat. Another foot added to the small strip seat would have made this float perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie C.

customer_reviews.title: Really well made. Perfect for my 6 year old.
customer_reviews.text: We use it as a pool toy, so the fact that he sits in the water and that it runs on the small side is perfect for us. It seems built to last and blows up quickly with an electric pump. Knocked off 1 star because the cross bar is held in with velcro, a poor fastener choice, so it keeps falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.S

customer_reviews.title: well worth it the purchase! Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I have had one for myself for a few years and love it and just recently purchase one for my boyfriend. We have had a great time fishing in them. They are easy to use and light weight to carry in a back pack.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Oakey

customer_reviews.title: Exaggerated features.
customer_reviews.text: Love all the pockets and the back rest! Hate that the picture makes it look like you sit out of the water. Not only do I not want my feet in water while I'm trying to fish for multiple reasons, I don't wanna accidently drop my tackle in the water right next to me.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene r moore

customer_reviews.title: Made hubby happy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for hubby's fly fishing at the lake. He has added so many personalize options which shows me that he loves it! We will be trying it at the lake next weekend, but it works well in the pool. Just no fish in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: RetiredAndLovingIt

customer_reviews.title: It’s just okay
customer_reviews.text: It gets the job done but it doesn’t have a quick deflate so it’s slow to let the air out
customer_reviews.author: AFGHANVET

customer_reviews.title: So Far So Good
customer_reviews.text: So far it's been alright but I've only taken it out on one short trip. I plan to use it a lot next summer though if nothing happens and am looking forward to it. Time will tell as they say but so far i'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to fish on the lake!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Quiet movement on the lake. Well designed with durable fabric. Easy to assemble (good instructions). Note that the valve stems are not Shrader types like you have on bikes and car tires. Good to have an auto/electric air pump with adapter for the valves.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Grandson sure likes it. He uses it almost every ...
customer_reviews.text: Grandson sure likes it. He uses it almost every weekend!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Meter

customer_reviews.title: Teton- Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Nice tube. Comfortable to fish out of. Easy to transport because it is very light. Inflated fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great first fishing float
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars all around , great for a first float tube, much more convenient then kayak or boat. Comfortable for 4-6 hours of continuous floating
customer_reviews.author: Jason Gamboa

customer_reviews.title: Fishing
customer_reviews.text: Wish it had cup holders but this tube is great. Husband caught many fish! Great material, comfortable if you’re 5’10 250 this will be fun. Just bring a hat
customer_reviews.author: Dan Tohlen

customer_reviews.title: To me it is better than fishing off of a boat
customer_reviews.text: One of the most enjoyable ways to fish. To me it is better than fishing off of a boat.
customer_reviews.author: ryan c

customer_reviews.title: Zipper did not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I liked the way it floated but the zipper tore from the fabric when it was inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Jones

customer_reviews.title: This seems to be okay for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be okay for the price. The fabric is a bit thinner than other floats that I have
customer_reviews.author: IFish

customer_reviews.title: Lost center PVC pipe on first day.
customer_reviews.text: The center PVC pipe is held with Velcro, which even the smallest turbulence will remove.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Grindstaff

customer_reviews.title: stable and a fantastic way to get around the lake
customer_reviews.text: Well made, stable and a fantastic way to get around the lake. It even fits easily in my small hatchback station wagon. A great value for the money. 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: Irons

customer_reviews.title: Good price
customer_reviews.text: Very good preoduct. Also very affordable. Bought two. One for me and one for my brother. Had a good time and very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Spend an extra $100 and get one with a bow design with a floating cushion and you will more than triple your enjoyment.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a backup so that a pal can come with me and be stranded on the shore. It's so small compared to my primary float tube! Plus not having a floating seat stinks because you sit so much lower in the water. Spend an extra $100 and get one with a bow design with a floating cushion and you will more than triple your enjoyment.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Karns

customer_reviews.title: Great Float Tube!
customer_reviews.text: This float tube was easy to put together. It sits nice and high in the water. The pockets are roomy, nice and large. It is very comfortable which is important! For the price it is very cool!
customer_reviews.author: Franco

customer_reviews.title: great little boat
customer_reviews.text: this is the best boat I could find for the money it keeps you nice and high in the water and has plenty of storage. Defiantly worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rutter

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 8 year old. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Secure and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for float tubing Mammoth or any other lake! No Complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Britney Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Fishing in Bellyboat
customer_reviews.text: Like how the boat sits low in the water while fishing and easy it is to get in and out.
customer_reviews.author: smart buy

customer_reviews.title: Float Tube
customer_reviews.text: Great float tube for the money. Bought for my grandson and he has had a wonderful summer fly fishing in the tube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son had a great time in it. Rides high
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Great product, shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: Great product, I use it in a non-conventional way (pool tile cleaning)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: This made for a great summer. With a good set of fins I was able to race across the water. This Float tube also has a lot of storage to bring tackle with me.
customer_reviews.author: Marcial

customer_reviews.title: It seems very good to me
customer_reviews.text: It seems very good to me, but I have ̈not proove it in water jet, by the way I sugest some kind of support for the fishing pole, when you are tying for changing the fly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. The price was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great product. The price was perfect. I bought two of these for me and a friend to trout fish on vacation. They are very comfortable, have plenty of storage and were easy to assemble. The only drawback was the table that goes over the lap could have been secured better. It is fastened by Velcro and would come undone frequently. This could easily be rigged or fixed. The PVC pole that supports the table could be a bit longer to stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C.

customer_reviews.title: awesome
customer_reviews.text: perfect VERY comfortable and relaxing to fish from, just ensure you have a good seal and air tight before setting out.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Brant Kirk

customer_reviews.title: fish on
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. durable extremely light weight. Holds more than 250 lbs. exceeded my expectations. i use it everytime i go fishing
customer_reviews.author: johnny tellez

customer_reviews.title: outdoors
customer_reviews.text: This product was exactly what I expected when I received in in the mail and matched the description on the website
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Y

customer_reviews.title: Best tube for the price, actually good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this solely for pack-in trips. It's size and weight are ideal for that. But best is the price. I was very impressed with the quality and features for the price paid. It's a bit snug for every day fishing, but for hiking trips, it's ideal.
customer_reviews.author: J. Breidenbach

customer_reviews.title: We own three now and enjoy taking them fishing
customer_reviews.text: Quick set up. We own three now and enjoy taking them fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Preville

customer_reviews.title: This is a good enough tube for floating
customer_reviews.text: This is a good enough tube for floating, but if you are in a situation where you float AND wade, be advised that the bar across the screen pops out of place easily, which is problematic when you are wading. The construction is durable and tough, however, I did not receive the top inflatable bladder with mine. The tube used for inflating the main tube seems to be poorly located in my opinion, although with a little difficulty you can still access it. The pockets have plenty of room for lures and other equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Dano from Houston

customer_reviews.title: They are both into fishing big time and love to be out in the water with all their ...
customer_reviews.text: We got one of these float tubs for our other grandson last year and he loves it, so I know this one will too. They are both into fishing big time and love to be out in the water with all their stuff for fishing.
customer_reviews.author: R R

customer_reviews.title: Great first tube
customer_reviews.text: This float tube is great value for money and I would highly recommend it for someone that is looking to purchase there first float tube
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Only use once so far. But held up well ...
customer_reviews.text: Only use once so far . But held up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too small and not high quality. But it's cheap if that's what your looking for
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Float Tube
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday and he loves it. He has used it many times in the last month, hasnt caught any fish yet, lol but he loves being able to get around the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Irishow4

customer_reviews.title: Good Float Tube
customer_reviews.text: This was a pretty good tube for the price. It was very good starter tube because it had a lot of pocket space and was easy to inflate. I used this tube in mission bay while spotted bay bass fishing and it worked fine. i would have liked the tube to move a little faster through the water and instead of cheap velcro to hold up the apren they should have used a bunji strap like most float tubes. Overall I got a float tube that was like the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TUBE FOR THE MONEY
customer_reviews.text: RECEIVED MY FLOAT TUBE QUICKLY AND IN GREAT SHAPE. LOOKS PERFECT BUT OF COURSE I CAN'T TRY IT NOW AS IT IS FEBRUARY IN THE STATE OF MAINE. BUT I T SURE LOOKS LIKE A GREAT PRODUCT FOR THE PRICE!! MY BUDDY JUST BOUGHT ON ALSO SO WE WILL TRY THEM OUT IN APRIL. CAN'T GIVE IT A 5 ON LOOKS ALONE.
customer_reviews.author: tom wilkey

customer_reviews.title: If ur looking 4like a tube that will swollow u ...
customer_reviews.text: If ur looking for a tube that will swollow u and cause u to walk over every place the water isn't at least 3feetget deep then this is the tube for u! The only reason i didnt give it 1 * is it did at least float....
customer_reviews.author: Brother Reed

Assembled size: 42.5 inch L 40 inch W 18.5 inch H
Hydrodynamic hull shape for improved tracking and steering
